botanianeedsit.page.mana_charger.0: How often did you forget about your Terra Shatterer floating in the pool?$(br)Now you can sleep well.
botanianeedsit.page.mana_capacitors.0: Manacapacitors are another way to store mana. They are not like rings or tablets you can't use mana from them to feed your tools.$(br)Change the pool mod to 'From pool to item' and throw capacitor into it. The capacitor will become charged. If you want to transfer mana from charged capacitor to pool, change pool mod to 'From item to pool'.
